org.crosswire.common.util
类 MsgBase

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.common.util.MsgBase
直接已知子类：
Msg, Msg, Msg, Msg, Msg, Msg, Msg, Msg, Msg, SectionNames, UserMsg, UserMsg, UserMsg, UserMsg, UserMsg, UserMsg, UserMsg
public class MsgBase
extends java.lang.Object

A base class for implementing type safe internationalization (i18n) that is easy for most cases. See Msg for an example of how to inherit from here.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com], DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors.
